text: On this Memorial Day we remember the heroes who laid down their lives in service to our nation and freedom. Thank you for your sacrifice. 🇺🇸 http

The U.S. will continue to support Moldova with the influx of refugees. I’m also committed to  working together to support Moldova’s energy security and the government’s efforts to root out corruption. 🇺🇸🤝🏼🇲🇩
It was an honor meeting President @user in Moldova. I thanked her for Moldova’s generosity in hosting Ukrainian refugees. http
